statements: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, monthly_savings_amount FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score > 50;
SELECT customer_name, savings_plan FROM Customers WHERE monthly_savings_amount >= 1000.00;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, savings_plan FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score < 50 ORDER BY monthly_savings_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY behavior_score ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers WHERE savings_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT customer_name, monthly_savings_amount FROM Customers ORDER BY monthly_savings_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, savings_plan FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score > 80 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE monthly_savings_amount > 5000 AND behavior_score < 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, savings_plan_preference FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlanSegments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, additional_notes FROM SavingsPlanSegments WHERE additional_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM SavingsPlanSegments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers WHERE savings_plan_preference = 'Gold' ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, savings_plan_preference, behavior_score FROM Customers JOIN SavingsPlanSegments ON behavior_score > 70 AND criteria LIKE '%high%' ORDER BY behavior_score ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT * FROM SavingsBehavior ORDER BY behavior_type DESC;
SELECT customer_id, savings_plan FROM CustomerDetails WHERE savings_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_details FROM SavingsBehavior WHERE behavior_id < 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, savings_plan FROM CustomerDetails JOIN PlanPreferences ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = PlanPreferences.customer_id ORDER BY preference_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE savings_plan = 'Gold Plan';
SELECT * FROM SavingsBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'Investment' ORDER BY behavior_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_description FROM PlanPreferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerDetails WHERE savings_plan = 'Silver Plan');

SELECT customer_name, email, preference_description FROM CustomerDetails JOIN PlanPreferences ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = PlanPreferences.customer_id WHERE PlanPreferences.preference_type = 'personalized';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE savings_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, savings_plan FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE savings_plan='Gold Plan'
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR age < 25 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE savings_plan IS NOT NULL AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM Customers WHERE age >= 30
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, savings_plan FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT plan_id, AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans GROUP BY plan_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, savings_plan FROM Customers WHERE savings_plan='Gold';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, amount, transaction_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.plan_name, t.amount FROM Customers c INNER JOIN SavingsPlans s ON c.savings_plan = s.plan_name INNER JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;

SELECT c.customer_name, ps.total_contributions, ps.average_interest_rate FROM Customers c INNER JOIN SavingsPlans s ON c.savings_plan = s.plan_name INNER JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id INNER JOIN CustomerSegmentation cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id INNER JOIN PlanStatistics ps ON s.plan_id = ps.plan_id WHERE cs.segment = 'High Net Worth';
